description: Geometric Multigrid Solver Package - Solves the finite-difference equations using a geometric multigrid algorithm

variables.name: COMMENT
variables.description: Optional comment lines at beginning of file.
variables.tooltip: Lines starting with '#' are treated as comments and ignored by MODFLOW.

variables.name: RCLOSE
variables.tooltip: Inner iterations stop when the maximum absolute value of the residual is less than RCLOSE. Typical: 0.01 to 1.0.

variables.name: IITER
variables.description: Maximum number of inner (multigrid) iterations per outer iteration.
variables.tooltip: Maximum number of GMG iterations within each outer iteration. Typical: 100.

variables.name: HCLOSE
variables.tooltip: Outer iterations stop when the maximum absolute head change is less than HCLOSE. Typical: 0.001 to 0.01.

variables.name: MXITER
variables.tooltip: Maximum number of outer (Picard) iterations per time step. Typical: 50-100.

variables.name: DAMP
variables.tooltip: Damping parameter for outer iterations. 1.0=no damping. Values < 1.0 reduce head changes per iteration. Typical: 0.5-1.0.

variables.name: IADAMP
variables.description: Adaptive damping flag. 0=constant damping, 1=adaptive damping, 2=relative reduced residual damping.
variables.tooltip: 0=use DAMP as constant. 1=adaptive damping adjusts automatically. 2=cooley under-relaxation based on relative reduced residual.

variables.name: IOUTGMG
variables.description: Output flag. 0=no output, 1=convergence summary, 2=inner iteration details, 3=max detail, 4=progress info.
variables.tooltip: Controls detail level of solver output to the listing file. 0=silent. Higher values provide more diagnostic information.

variables.name: ISM
variables.tooltip: Multigrid smoother selection. 0=ILU(0) (recommended, more robust). 1=SGS (faster per iteration but may need more iterations).

variables.name: ISC
variables.tooltip: Controls which dimensions are coarsened in the multigrid. 0=all three (standard). Other values restrict coarsening to specified dimensions.
